Traditionalist Values: Peace(Humans), Rikti Culture. if Hro'Dtohz:Empower(Traditionalists) Then Rikti Cultural Power: Will Increase end.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The current balance of power is at a value of {1_Num} in favor of {2_Party}.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be The Rikti [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only enact an Empower decision once every {3_Turns} turns [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{4_Magistrates} [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each level of Empowerment granted to the Traditionalists increases your Empire's [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output by 10%, increases the [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence resting point of City-States by 3, and causes [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts to City_States to produce 7% more Influence. However, it will also decrease Unit Production by 5%, increase Unit Maintenance costs by 7%, and reduce XP earned by Units in Combat by 10%. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Magistrate cost of this Decision increases after reaching a balance of power of 3 in the Traditionalists' favor. If the balance of power is at least 3 in favor of the Restructurists, this Decision can be enacted for free. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot increase the balance of power by more than 5 in any party's favor. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If the balance of power becomes 5 in favor of the Traditionalists, your Empire gains a +50% bonus to the birth rate of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Writers, Artists, and Musicians.
